body_text: I don't think this is a good idea. This makes it so there is state outside of state, and means that actions are no longer pure. This breaks a lot of assumptions Redux makes, including the redux dev tools. It also breaks a lot of expectations developers may have. It is surprising, which isn't really a good idea.
